code: @Override public void close() {     super.close().     if (NetworkModule.TRANSPORT_TYPE_SETTING.exists(settings) == false || NetworkModule.TRANSPORT_TYPE_SETTING.get(settings).equals(SecurityField.NAME4)) {         try {             GlobalEventExecutor.INSTANCE.awaitInactivity(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS).         } catch (InterruptedException e) {             Thread.currentThread().interrupt().         }         try {             ThreadDeathWatcher.awaitInactivity(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS).         } catch (InterruptedException e) {             Thread.currentThread().interrupt().         }     } }
